item.title: Python review
item.description: Python has become first-choice language for data-analysist and researchers. Why did this happened?

item.title: First program in Python: installation and basic syntax
item.description: In this lesson we will start to write simple scripts in Python. To do that we need to install the interpreter, than investigate the ways how to run Python code and, finally, learn basic datatypes and expressions.

Use cases of Artificial Neural Networks
item.description: Neural networks are very mighty and very fun instrument of data scientists. Here I will show you why.

item.title: Early History of Artificial Neural Networks
item.description: In this lesson we review the history of Neural Networks and code a simple perceptron in Python.
